attributes.action: Laws need to be changed in Registering on Internet Social Networking Sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With more and more shocking news regarding Social Networking Sites unless for Business matters, we should have stronger laws inplace to check the identity of the person registering, there is a Police Database already as well as a sex offenders register for the UK these should be linked to a persons registration to cut down on Networking crimes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the social networking sites themselves. The government cannot dictate policy for private companies, or those based overseas.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
